faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about AI Video Anomaly Detection

items.title: What types of anomalies can be detected?
items.description: Our tool can identify various anomalies such as sudden movements, unexpected objects, unusual behavior, and any deviations from normal activity patterns.

items.title: Is AI Video Anomaly Detection free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets 30 free analyses daily, which enables you to inspect numerous videos. Additional analyses can be earned through challenges or referrals. Subscription plans are available for professional needs.

items.title: Can I use detected content for professional projects?
items.description: Paid subscribers can utilize results for commercial purposes, while free users may use findings for personal projects only. Review our Terms of Service for specifics.

items.title: How is my video data protected?
items.description: Detection happens locally on your device, ensuring your footage is never uploaded or stored remotely. This guarantees total privacy and security during the analysis process.
